item.content:encoded:

(as of Nov 30,2022 12:45:43 UTC – Details)


Loomla: Provide your pets with a high-quality daily life.
Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9 inches; 1.98 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ VC1402
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ May 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Shenzhen Jiangrui Investment Development
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08NKF9PLS

High Capacity – Staying hydrated can be a challenge for pets, especially during the summer months. The Loomla stainless steel cat water fountain is your answer to a long-lasting water supply for small pets in your home. The dog and cat water fountain holds 85 ounces, it’s enough water for a small animal for almost a week! The water level window shows you how much is left in the cat and dog water bowl dispenser, so your pet can stay hydrated and not get thirsty.
Whisper-quiet – This water fountain for cats inside has a water pump that is so quiet, you’d never know it’s there! The low noise water dispenser for cats and dogs is a great way to help your pets stay calm and hydrated at night. Many animals are frightened by loud noises, so the quiet design of this dog and cat fountain water bowl makes it more enticing for animal owners who want their pets healthy and content.
Entertainment For Your Pet – Our cat and dog water fountain was designed with your pets in mind and provides an easy way for them to quench their thirst while having fun at the same time! A pet water fountain can be just the cool thing you need in order to keep your little buddy hydrated and entertained. Pet supplies water fountains are an amusing way of making water enjoyable for animals.
Always Clean & Fresh Water – Don’t let your pets go thirsty! Our pet fountain is a great way to keep your furry friends hydrated. The dog and cat water dispenser ensures that no matter how busy you might be, they’ll always have clean and fresh water to drink. The cat and dog water dispenser filter uses multiple purification systems, it purifies the water using carbon non-woven fabric and ion exchange resin. 2 exchange filters are included with the dog and cat supplies water fountain.

Why should you choose the Loomla Water Fountains?

  • Fun for your pet – For your pets drinking from a drinking fountain is way more interesting and fun than just drinking out of their bowl.
  • Stylish Design – The pet drinking fountain has lovely and stylish bellflower design and comes in a variety of colors that make it an attractive home decor item.
  • 3 Water Flow Settings – Adjusting the automatic water dispenser settings to match your pet’s size and tastes is easy. Just choose one of our automatic drink dispenser modes: Flower waterfall / Waterfall and fountain / Fountain
  • Healthy choice – Clean water is one of the most important aspects of your pet’s health. Pet water fountain filter has an upgraded sophisticated filtration system that filters water better than ever before.
  • Easy Installation – Our automatic dog water dispenser is easy to set up, just affix the pump, install led next to the water level window, add filter and drinking dish on top, and you are good to go! We also provide a manual with our water fountain for dogs inside.

Read more

Structure of Loomla Fountain

Take Good Care of Your Pet

What should you pay attention to?

  1. The fountain’s LED lights have two modes that can be controlled on and off.
  2. The pump has two locating holes to assist installation.
  3. Please use it indoors on a flat surface.
  4. For your pet’s health and safety, clean the water pump at least once every two weeks.
  5. To provide clean enough water continuously, please replace the filter and the sponge every two or three weeks, and rinse the filter with water before use.
  6. Please be careful to prevent pets from chewing the wires and swallowing the parts.

What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain（8.66 x 8.66 x 5.9in）

1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）

1 x DC Pump (with a 70.9in cord）

2 x Filters

1 x Pre-filter Sponge

1 x Instruction Manual

From the brand

How did we get our start?

In 2016, a 5-person team with the same dream and determination founded Tomxcute. Today, we are a company that has more than 200 staff and owns over 6 departments with its products popularly sold in 10 different countries. By 2022, our sales volume has reached 5,000,000. This is where we get our start.

Click to Purchase Pet Supplies

Click to Purchase Pet Supplies

Tomxcute product accessories

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.46 x 8.46 x 3.94 inches; 1.83 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ 0004-F
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ August 27, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ tomxcute
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09DSVFNRW

Double filtration system: Equipped with activated carbon filter and pre-filter sponge, the automatic cat and dog water fountain can provide your pet with pure drinking water and keep healthy.
3.2 L/108 Oz Large Capacity: The capacity of water fountain is 3.2L, and the high and low water level lines are marked in the container, and the effective volume is more than 3L, very suitable for multi-pet families.
Ultra-quiet: The 1.5W pump is super silent when running, keep it below 20db, only the sound of water flow can be heard, even if it runs at night, it will not affect your sleep.
Encourage Drinking : This cat water fountain is equipped with a faucet and spring surge modes which match Habits of drinking water under the tap of cats, dogs. The dynamic water flow helps attract pets to drink,which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Customer Support: For any questions, support or complaint, please feel free to contact us, we will help you solve the problem 24H.

Dual Filtration pet water fountain

Filter hair, debris and large particles, remove odor and impurities.Protect the drinking water health of pets such as cats and dogs.

Easy to clean

TOMXCUTE which can be washed by hand or machine washed in the dishwasher. It is recommended to clean once a week.

stainless steel pet fountain

our pet fountain is made of imported total 304 stainless,High grade Stainless Steel Drinking Fountain is unbreakable, durable and easy to clean

Read more

Sleep-like quiet

The noise level is less than 20 decibels, creating a more quiet and comfortable environment for you and your pet, No power consumption too much.

Large capacity

No matter where you go, you don’t have to worry about pet drinking water. 3.2L large-capacity pet water dispenser.

5.What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain, 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）, 1 x Pre-filter Sponge, 1 x DC Pump, 3 x Filters, 1 x Instruction Manual

Read more

According to the various behaviors of pets, the faucet type pet water dispenser is more favored by cats and dogs

Q: How often should I clean the drinking fountain?

A: We recommend cleaning the water dispenser every two weeks.

Q: How can I get the filters for 2-4week replacements?

A: We also sell the replacement filters online. If you have any questions, please feel free to find us.( 3 carbon filters included in the package of the cat fountain )

Q: How can I judge the water level in the drinking fountain?

A: Due to technical difficulty, it is not easy to provide a visible window for the stainless steel water dispenser, but we have marked the “MIN” and “MAX” lines in the water tank.

Q: What should I pay attention to about the pump?

A: Firstly, the pump should be cleaned every 2 week; then if the water level in the tank is too low, the water pump still keeps running and prone to fail. Please add water to the water tank in time.

Q: How long is the power cable?

A: The length of the cable is 180 cm.

Q. Noise Level Up ？

Check if it`s empty or water level drop below minimum, then refill the fountain under max level. Check if there are hairs blocking the impeller of the water pump.Sometimes the impeller was totally encrusted in calcium. Please clean the pump weekly to extend the life , and more importantly, it is healthier for pets to drink water.Any questions and concerns, please send message to us on Amazon, and we will give you a satisfied solution within 16 hours.

From the brand

Drink happier and healthier

How did we get our start?

WOPET was founded in 2015 in CA,USA,JP,EU at the same time, our version that brings joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world.

Why do we love what we do?

WOPET team all love pets and technology and truly believe that every pet deserves a long and healthy life full of happiness and love.

What makes our products unique?

We are determined to create a boundless high-quality life for people with love and technology, and aimed at provide care for the value of life, and let pet owners get rid of the constraints of time and space.

W300 Cat Water Fountain

W500 pet fountain

Cat Water Fountain

Accessories for W300 and W300B

Automatic Pet Feeder

Boundless Love for Pets

WOPET vision is to bring joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world!

Package Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 9.33 x 6.65 x 4.96 inches; 1.34 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ W300
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ June 21, 2022
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ WOPET
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B0B4NHRR6H
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Multiple Filtration：WOPET W300 pet water fountain has a triple filtration system. The sponge captures bulky contaminants like pet fur and debris. The ion exchange resin layer softens tap water, and the activated carbon removes nasty flavors and scents.Change the filter every 1 week will be more healthier!
BPA FREE & High-End Materials: Our W300 cat water fountain is BPA free, durable, and it’s easy to operate and clean,Make your pet fall in love with drinking water, no need to worry their health problem any longer.
Ultra-Quiet Pump: The pump is whisper-quiet and stays below 35 decibels. Low-voltage pump is reliable and usually lasts 2 years. The pump is detachable and replaceable.
Easy to Set Up and Clean: WOPET W300 cat drinking fountain is easy to assemble and disassemble for cleaning and replacement. Note：the pet fountain Doesn’t come with a wall plug. It is recommended to use a 5V, 1A adapter or power bank to operate it.


At WOpet, we all love pets and technology. Our vision is to bring joy and happiness to every pet lover in the world.




WOPET was founded in 2015 in USA,CA,JP,EU. Wopet will use its innovative scientific and technological capabilities and persistent sense of social responsibility to provide a more complete boundless pet loving experience for pet families around the world.

  • 2L Large Water Capacity
  • Dishwasher safe
  • Silent Running
  • User Manual*1
  • Brush*1
  • Filter*1

WOPET Pet Water Fountain is made of high quality ABS material, which is BPA-free, durable, safe and easy to assemble and clean.

2 Flow Designs could attract pets to drink more water.

Visible Water Level could check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

  • Please clean the water fountain every 3-4 days;
  • Please clean pumps every 2-4 weeks;
  • Please replace the filter every 2 weeks;
  • Please fill in water in time when the water level reaches Min.

Read more




Emergency Water Storage

With a water storage capacity of about 80ml, the water tray can still provide water for your pets when power outage occurs.

Visible Water Level

Check the water level at any time, and always know the capacity of the bucket to ensure that pets drink enough water.

Two Drinking modes

Flower waterfall or gentle fountain let your pets to choose!

Read more



Cleaning the pump is essential to extend water fountain life and keep the water fresh. Please clean the pump at least every two weeks.

The steps of cleaning the pump

Step 1. Remove the sponge

Step 2. Remove the Pump Connector Rubber

Step 3. Remove the pump cover

Step 4. Remove the impeller

Step 5. Clean the parts with dish soap and warm water

Read more


Important Reminders:

1. For indoor use only!

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week. Especially the small grooves on the fountain can be cleaned every day. Small grooves are designed to filter impurities, allowing pets to drink healthier water.

3. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least the minimum level in the water bowl. The lowest water level is more than the water outlet of the pump.

4. According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, Change the filter every 1 week will be healthier!

5. Please keep the cable hidden to prevent pets from chewing it.

6. WOPET Never Authorized any sellers to sell official genuine filters. For your pet’s health and safety, please search “B0B5Q4N6Q2” to purchase the real WOPET W300 Filters,DO NOT use the cheap and pirated filters.

7.Make sure the filter is SOAKED, The water needs to flow through it and it will just spill over if the filter isn’t soaked thoroughly.

From the brand

At PUPIHOM we are focusing on high-quality pet products and are committed to providing your pets with a healthier life. We have always put the customer experience at the center and our vision is to continuously improve our products according to customer needs.

CW002 Pet Water Fountain

CW003 Pet Water Fountain

CW004 Pet Water Fountain

ASIN ‏ : ‎ B09ZPBW85D
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ Switzerland

【Wide Drinking Area】The drinking dispenser with the 300ml extra-large water dish is ideal for families with multiple pets. Even in the event of a sudden power outage, there is enough water to last a day.
【Noise-Free】The pet water fountain is equipped with unique water way design which reduces the sound of the water flow to less than 36 decibels, and enjoys a quiet moment with your cute pet.
【Premium Materials】The dispenser is made from high quality ABS material which is BPA free, for a more durable experience.
【Powerful Filtration】The 3-stage filtration system of the water fountain effectively removes sediment, dust, hair, odor, chlorine, heavy metals for a clean drinking experience.
【3 Flow Modes】The fountain has 3 modes namely spring, flower bubble and flower waterfall, which can be switched as per the pet’s needs, which will help keep your pet interested to help them drink more water.
【After Sales】With our reliable quality control, customer service and technical support, we provide you with a 6 month return policy. If you have any confusion regard to the product, please feel free to contact us.
Note: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

PUPIHOM CW003 Pet Water Fountain

* 7*24 circulating filtration, so that every drop of water can be fully purified, drinking clean, soft water for a long time is beneficial to the health of the pet’s urinary system.

* The pet water feeder solves your trouble of frequently feeding pets. The 3.4L effective capacity can supply a small and medium pet for a week, which is suitable for families who often take short trips.

* Design Patent: The water flowing from the drinking tray can wash away the hair and debris on the surface, keeping the water clean at all times.

* The appearance of this automatic water dispenser is designed by an Italian designer, which conforms to modern aesthetics, making it not only a pet water dispenser, but also matches the design of your home.

  • Model: CW003
  • Capacity: 3.4L/115oz
  • Filters: 3 Pack
  • Filter Model: PAWF001
  • ! For indoor use only!
  • ! The filter should be changed every 2 to 3 Weeks
  • ! The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks

Read more

Anti-dry-burning pump, you don’t have to worry about burning out the pump even if there is water shortage. The pump has a life span of 2.5 to 4 years.

The three-speed adjustable water pump can be used with different water outlet modes. It is recommended to use the lowest gear with the spring mode, and the mid-range and high-end gears with the faucet mode.

Removable water pump, easy to clean, proper cleaning and maintenance of the pump will help prolong the service life of the pump, it is recommended to clean it once a month.

Read more

Safety Protection: 1.2m woven power cord, which is sturdy and tight, and not easy to be bitten or chewed by pets, don’t worry about pet safety.

Minimalist structure, easy to install and clean, it is recommended to clean the pet drinking fountain once a month.

Contains 3 replacement filters. The triple filtration system with water softening function ensures safer, cleaner, and fresher drinking water, making your pet healthier.

Read more

Q: Where can I get replacement filters?

A: Please search for B0B2JYRZCD for the replacement filters.

Q: The pet water fountain does not run with water, what should I do?

A: Please set the pump’s water flow speed to the maximum speed, to make sure that the fountain has a good water output!

Q: Can l use this drinking fountain outside?

A: No. This fountain is designed for indoor use only.

Q: How frequently do l need to replace the filter?

A: According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, please replace the filter every 2 to 3 weeks.

Q: How often should l clean the fountain?

A: The fountain should be cleaned at least every two weeks. Please clean it once a week if you re living in an area with hard water.

Q: Does it have to be plugged in all the time or can it run on batteries?

A: This pet fountain has no batteries, so it needs to be always plugged in.

Product Dimensions ‏ : ‎ 8.4 x 8.4 x 5.3 inches; 2.18 Pounds
Item model number ‏ : ‎ VK663
Date First Available ‏ : ‎ November 12, 2020
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ Veken
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08NC54VZN
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

High-quality: Made of food grade materials, this drinking fountain is BPA free, durable, and easy to operate and clean. The water-level window and LED Light let you observe how much water your pets drink in real time, and lets you see exactly when you need to fill the water bowl. There is a switch on the wire to control the light so you could easily turn it on or off.
Two flow designs: The Veken Pet Fountain has 2 modes: flower waterfall (faucet drinking) and the gentle fountain. The water streaming down the petals of the flower on the fountain will draw your pets attention and encourage animals to drink more often.
Triple-filtration system: In addition to keeping water fresh via circulation, the triple-filtration system, including activated carbon layer, ion exchange resin and thick non-woven fabric, keeps water better tasting and safer for pets.
Ultra-quiet pump: The pump on this water dispenser is ultra-quiet, has low-energy consumption and will last 1.5-2 years.

Benefits of Choosing Us

Appeal to your pet’s natural instincts

In the wild running water is often safer to drink than still water and your pet knows that. A water bowl sitting out near their food could be unappealing. Cats and dogs are naturally attracted to running water being dispensed from a fountain, appealing to their natural instincts.

Your right-hand man in life

2.8L is suitable for multiple pet homes. The fountain is very easy to operate and clean. If you are looking for an advanced water fountain or your pet has any drinking problems, Veken will be the right choice for you and your pet.

The third water flow setting

You can remove the cap to form a flower bubble to increase the water flow for pets to drink. This fountain has various flow modes so its easy to find the option that is best for your pet. When placing the cap on the flower, make sure the ridge aligns with the notch on the flower.

Read more

What You Will Get:

  • 1 x Pet Water Fountain（8.3 x 8.3 x 6.6in）
  • 1 x Adapter（AC 100-240V）
  • 1 x DC Pump （with a 6ft power cord）
  • 2 x Filters
  • 1 x Pre-filter Sponge
  • 1 x Instruction Manual

Cleaning the pump is essential to the longevity of the fountain. Please clean the pump at least every 2 weeks.

Step 1. Remove the sponge

Step 2. Remove the pump cover

Step 3. Remove the impeller

Step 4. Clean the parts with dish soap and warm water

Read more

Important Reminders:

1. For indoor use only!

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week.

3. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least the minimum level in the water bowl.

4. To prevent the activated carbon dust (it will not harm your pets) from shedding, please soak the filter in water for 2 minutes and rinse it thoroughly under running water before use. It is recommended to flush the filter and sponge with water every time you change the water.

5. According to your pet’s drinking frequency and the number of pets using the fountain, replace the filter and the sponge every 2 to 3 weeks.

6. Please place the pump inside the square indention and make sure the double probe face towards the clear window in the water bowl.

7. Please keep the cable hidden to prevent pets from chewing it.

Two tiers, two times the fun! The Multi-Tier Pet Fountain has an upper and lower bowl for your pet to drink from, keeping them happy and hydrated. Pets love running water and are drawn to it. Pet fountains entice pets to drink more water which keeps them healthy and hydrated. With this fountain, pets can drink from the flowing stream or from the bowl tiers (which is awesome) because your pet needs 1 ounce of water per 1 pound they weigh every day. The water constantly circulates which keeps things fresh and helps to promote good pet hygiene. The levels of this fountain make this great for pets of all sizes since they can drink water at a height that’s comfortable for them. This is especially great for senior pets, so they won’t have to bend down as much to drink from the upper tier. This fountain works hard to make sure your best friend will have fresh water. A carbon filter and fountain pump work together so your pet will always have clean water to drink. We’ve made this fountain easy to clean – simply place the fountain in the top rack of the dishwasher and hand wash the pump separately. Your pet deserves the best. Trust PetSafe to keep your pet healthy, safe and happy.

GREAT FOR SENIOR PETS: The multi-tiered design of the fountain is great for senior or arthritic pets who can’t bend down to drink
ENCOURAGES HYDRATION: Falling water stream entices pets to drink more and helps support kidney health in pets through increased hydration
NO THIRSTY PETS: This fountain incorporates an open-bowl design so if your home loses power, your cat or dog will still have access to water
FRESH, FLOWING WATER: Replaceable carbon filter refreshes water and the foam filter catches pet hair and debris to keep your cat’s water clean

Keep Your Pet Healthy and Hydrated

Let the fountain do the work!

Give your furry friend fresh, flowing water with the PetSafe Multi-Tier Pet Fountain. The falling water stream encourages your pet to drink more. The fountain features three places for your pets to drink from as well. Let us help keep your pet healthy and hydrated so you and your pet can live happy together.

A Company You Can Trust

  • Global brand in pet products for nearly 30 years
  • U.S.-based experts available Monday through Saturday
  • We help pets and their people live happy together!

Healthy Pet Lifestyle

No More Worry

The flowing stream and multiple drinking areas help encourage your pet to drink more, so they get the right amount of water each day to keep them healthy and hydrated.

No More Dirty Water

With the Multi-Tier pet fountain, your pet never has to drink dirty water again. The filters and constant water circulation helps keep the water fresh.

More Happy Moments

By keeping your pet hydrated, you and your pet can enjoy playtime more and live happy together.

More PetSafe Solutions for You and Your Pet Replacement Activated Carbon Filters catch hair and debris, while the carbon keeps water fresh, making it more appealing to drink. Replacement Premium Activated Carbon Filters catch hair and debris, while the segmented carbon compartments offer even carbon distribution while keeping water fresh. Multi-Tier Pet Fountain Replacement Pump can be used as a replacement or as a back-up pump during pump cleanings. Comes with 3 brushes. Great for cleaning your Multi-Tier Pet Fountain pump. The PetSafe ScoopFree Self-Cleaning Automatic Litter Box stays fresh and clean without the hassle of scooping. Feed your pet from anywhere with the PetSafe Smart Feed. Set your pet’s feeding schedule or give some snacks during the day through the smartphone app-enabled feeder.

3 Easy Steps to Clean the Pump

Take the Pump Apart

Remove & keep the blue face plate by using your finger to pull on the small tab on the side.

Remove the Stator

Remove & keep the blue teardrop shaped stator by pulling up on the small lip.

Remove the Impeller

Use a fingernail to pull out the impeller, which is held in place magnetically & keep it. Clean the pump parts with warm water and soap, then reassemble.

From the brand

PETLIBRO was founded in 2019 in C.A., USA, in the belief that pet owners should be able to easily connect with their pets via trustable products.

Since established, with our affection for pets and obsession with detail, we have designed products that pet owners would desire and shipped to homes in the US, UK, Germany, French, CA and Japan.

Top Saving Fountain

Top Saving Feeder

Top Saving Feeder

Date First Available ‏ : ‎ March 18, 2021
Manufacturer ‏ : ‎ PETLIBRO
ASIN ‏ : ‎ B08ZCY1FJT
Country of Origin ‏ : ‎ China

Food-grade & Dishwasher Safe: PETLIBRO pet water fountain is made entirely of 304 stainless steel. It’s BPA-free, rust- and corrosion-resistant, and can be washed in the dishwasher.
Adjustable Water Flow: The water flow of the PETLIBRO water dispenser can be adjusted to suit your pet’s preference, attracting it to drink more water, which can prevent your pet suffering from urinary and kidney diseases.
Super Quiet & Easy to Use: A silent pump means this dog water dispenser operates below 30dB, which is almost inaudible. The ergonomic handle makes it easy to pull the lid off to clean inside and add water.
24/7 Filtered Fresh Water: PETLIBRO automatic pet fountain is equipped with a filter and pre-filter sponge. The double filtration system filters hair and other debris to remove odors and impurities, providing purified running water for your pet. (Replace filter every 2-4 weeks) Search “B08ZCTGNGD” for filter.
Leak- & Splash-proof Design: Overflow is prevented by a raised pump holder, and the trumpet-shaped water outlet pipe can prevent splashing of water even when the water outlet is blocked by a pet’s naughty paw. We offer 30 days free return and 1 year warranty, please feel free to contact us to get a satisfied solution.

We focus on the unique needs of pets. Our affection for pets and obsession with detail, is what leads us to make premium products constantly, deliver a convenient lifestyle to you, and help your pets have a better life.

Keep Your Pet Hydrated and Healthy

PETLIBRO Stainless Steel Pet Water Fountain is designed for cats, dogs and other medium-sized pets. Enough intake of water plays an important role in the health of your pets. As pet lovers, we designed the stainless steel water fountain to take care of your adorable pets by attracting them to love drinking water.

  • SUS 304 Stainless Steel Body
  • 2L Large Water Capacity
  • Adjustable Water Flow
  • Double Filtration System(Please search “B08ZCTGNGD” to buy the true filters)
  • Runs Quietly( ≤30dB )
  • Dishwasher Safe
  • Leakage-proof & Splashing-proof
  • 5.9ft cable

Read more

Read more

Important Note:

  1. Only for indoor use.
  2. For your pet’s health and a longer pump service life, it is recommended to change the water thoroughly and clean the Water Tank, Tray, Foam Filter and Pump at least once a week.
  3. If you have multiple pets, it is recommended to clean the water fountain and change the filter more often.
  4. For your pet’s health, please search “B08ZCTGNGD” to purchase the real PETLIBRO Filters, DO NOT use the cheap and pirated filters.
  5. If your pet refuses to use the water fountain, it’s recommended to leave its previous water source next to the water fountain for a while. Your pet may need some time to get familiar with it. If your pet gets used to drinking from this Water Fountain, you can remove the previous water source.
  6. If the water fountain makes more noise, please check if the water level reaches the minimum level and if the impeller is covered by the scale. It is recommended to clean the impeller once a week.
  7. How to remove the scale: Remove the pump cover, soak for 30 minutes with a 1:1 ratio of white vinegar and aqueous solution or food-grade citric acid.
  8. Not recommended for large-sized dogs.
  9. If the Water Fountain is dispensing a low amount of water or dispensing no water, you can reset it by following the steps below:

  • Check if you have properly installed the Top Tray, make sure to refill water to the maximum level.
  • Wash and clean the Water Pump. (Recommended reference cleaning video)
  • If washing doesn’t work, please clean the tough scaling on the water pump and the impeller.

2.5L large capacity –  It has a water capacity of 2.5 liters (84 ounces), which means that it is great for small to medium sized pets. The circulation system helps provide healthy and hygienic water for beloved pets all day.
BPA free & quality material – Made of quality PP resin, this automatic water bowl is BPA free, durable, and it’s easy to operate and clean. Furthermore, each fountain comes with 1 silicone pad to catch splashing water from spills.
3 different flow designs – Veken Pet Fountain has 3 modes: flower waterfall, flower bubble, and gentle fountain. Each mode is specifically designed to meet the needs of various pets. The free-falling stream and bright color will attract curious pets to check it out.
Triple filtration system – The pet water fountain is equipped with 3 replacement filters, each composed of activated carbon, ion exchange resin and non-woven fabric, forming a triple filtration system to help keep your pets healthy and hydrated.

Read more

Read more

Benefits of Choosing Us

Lovable Design

Compact design will not take up too much space. Recirculating mechanism ensures optimum oxygenation of water. The 2.5L capacity meets the needs of small and medium-sized pets. Also, it is easy to install and clean, making life easier for you and your pet.

High-Quality Replacement Filter

Each set contains 3 replacement filters. The triple-action filtration system with water-softening features ensures safer, cleaner and fresher drinking water so that you can bid farewell to water quality problems.

Let Your Pet Love to Drink Water

With a scientific design: flowing water is more attractive to pets and they will definitely drink more often. Choose Veken’s fountain to improve the health of your pets. It is a close companion for pets and pet lovers.

Read more

Clean The Pump to Extend Life

Cleaning the pump is essential to the longevity of the fountain. Please clean the pump at least every 2 weeks.

Step 1: Remove the pump cover.

Step 2: Remove the Impeller cap by placing your fingernail underneath the small lip.

Step 3: Remove the Impeller and clean the parts with soap and warm water.

Read more

Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Click to Purchase
Replacement Filter Replacement Filter Pet Foutain Dog Grooming Kit Pet Foutain Replacement Pump

As pet owners, finding the best way to take care of our pets is a challenge — especially considering affordable options. That’s where the Veken Pet Fountain comes in as a great solution for pets that tend to seek out water sources aside from their bowls. Studies show that pets tend to prefer water from a running source which is why the Veken Pet Fountain is perfect for furry friends, especially the finicky ones, and their owners.

The Veken Pet Fountain keeps water running and the noise to a minimum. With sound measuring below 40dB, the Veken pump is ultra-quiet and long lasting. It is also made of quality PP resin, is BPA free and long lasting. Even still, cats often prefer running water because they can detect it with their keen sense of hearing. For many cats, using their sense of hearing to find running water is more reliable than using their sense of sight to find still water.

Plus, our triple filtration system ensures that the water is as clean as possible and will help keep your pet healthier and better hydrated. The Veken Pet Fountain has a water capacity of 2.5L, which makes it perfect for small to medium-sized pets. The fountain has three modes, so it’s easy to find the option that is best for your pet. There’s no need to worry about a mess as the Veken Pet Fountain also comes with a silicone feeding mat to help protect your floors from accidental spills.

The Veken Pet Fountain will be loved by all members of your family, but by none more so than your four-legged friends!

What You Will Get:

1 x Pet Water Fountain

1 x Adapter

1 x DC Pump

3 x Filters

1 x Pre-filter Sponge

1 x Silicone Mat

1 x Instruction Manual

Important Reminders:

1. Indoor use only.

2. For the health of your pet, it is suggested to change the water and clean the fountain every week.

3. The highest water level is 3/4 of the bowl height and the lowest water level is more than the water outlet of the pump. Sometimes loud fountains are the consequence of a low water level or a dirty impeller. Clean your fountain’s impeller and ensure the water reaches to at least its minimum level.

4. To prevent the activated carbon dust (it will not harm your pets) from shedding, please soak the filter in water for 2 minutes and rinse it thoroughly under running water before use. The filter should be changed every 2-3 weeks.

5. Please keep the cable away from pets chewing it.
